alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 1:37PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 and Maple Street near the Red River Ranch are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to continue falling reaching 5.2 feet Sunday morning. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued 10 PM EST.
